Summary: blue ball like light in the sky
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Lima
There were no other sightings in Lima on or around June 10th 2001
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were driving down the roadway I noticed a bright blue light in the sky it was still for about 10 seconds than it accelerated at an extremely high rate of speed. It shot down into some near by woods,After passing by the woods we noticed nothing. I do not know what this was but the two of us saw the exact same thing. It was not like anything I have ever seen before or since.
